page.title: 19Children's Games Part 2
page.content: A popular game for girls is "Piggy in the Middle". Three girls take part. The girl in the middle tries to stop the other two throwing the ball to each other. If she succeeds her place is then taken by the last person who threw the ball.Skipping is also popular.For this game you can have as many people as you like.Two people hold a piece of rope at each end and they swing it round and round and the other girls jump over the rope. Outside school us older girls play French skipping, which is played with elastic. Three players are needed. Two at the ends and one to do the jumping.we also play Queeni-O. For that game you use a ball of some sort and throw it behind you and the other people have to try and catch it.
